query: artificial intelligence and machine learning news

results.title: SiteMinder Appoints New Chiefs of Data, Tech to Unlock the Power of AI, Machine Learning for Hotels - Hospitality Net
results.content: SiteMinder Appoints New Chiefs of Data, Tech to Unlock the Power of AI, Machine Learning for Hotels SiteMinder, an ASX 200 company and the world’s leading hotel distribution and revenue platform, has made two new appointments within its executive leadership team to capitalize on the opportunities opened up by artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning for the global hotel industry. One of the appointments involves SiteMinder’s co-founder, Mike Rogers, whose role will evolve from Chief Technology Officer to Chief Data Officer to lead the company’s global data strategy and further its data science capabilities. The two appointments come at a pivotal time for SiteMinder, as the company transforms its technology stack into a ‘Smart Platform’, designed to introduce intelligence and automation capabilities to the highly-fragmented hotel industry.

results.title: Sapphire anvils squeeze metals atomically-thin - Nature.com
results.content: Taking inspiration from industrial forging, researchers have demonstrated a way to squeeze molten metals into atomically-thin layers, creating relatively large flakes of 2D metals. results.title: The evolution of private equity: AI and tech disruption - FinTech Futures
results.content: The evolution of private equity: AI and tech disruption - FinTech Futures: Fintech news AI is not the only force reshaping private equity as new technologies are creating entirely new operational paradigms, which include: As AI continues to reshape private equity’s fundamentals, forward-thinking firms are not just optimising existing processes – they are pioneering entirely new approaches that redefine what is possible in the industry. The firms that will dominate tomorrow’s landscape will not just be those with the most capital or the best networks – they will be the ones that successfully transform themselves into technology-powered investment engines. results.title: Hologen AI commits up to $430M to help take MeiraGTx’s Parkinson’s gene therapy through phase 3 and beyond - Fierce Biotech
results.content: Hologen AI commits $430M to MeiraGTx Parkinson’s gene therapy Hologen AI commits up to $430M to help take MeiraGTx’s Parkinson’s gene therapy through phase 3 and beyond MeiraGTx Cell & Gene Therapy Parkinson's disease AI and Machine Learning Artificial intelligence company Hologen AI has committed up to $430 million as part of a multi-faceted agreement to help take MeiraGTx’s Parkinson’s disease gene therapy all the way to market. The AI-focused company is handing over $200 million as an upfront payment, as well as forming a joint venture with MeiraGTx. Hologen will gift this new entity, to be named Hologen Neuro AI, with up to $230 million in committed capital that will be used to fully fund the development of AAV-GAD all the way to commercialization. MeiraGTx Cell & Gene Therapy Parkinson's disease AI and Machine Learning Deals Biotech

results.title: Workforce Analytics Market to Reach USD 9.16 Billion by 2034 | FMI - Newstrail
results.content: As businesses strive to adapt to rapidly changing labor markets and evolving workforce expectations, predictive workforce analytics provides a competitive edge by enabling companies to make data-backed decisions. HR analytics software is the backbone of workforce optimization efforts, offering comprehensive tools that provide actionable insights into employee performance, engagement, and retention. Advanced technologies, such as artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning, are expected to play a critical role in enhancing the functionality of workforce analytics tools by providing more accurate predictions for talent management and employee engagement. Detailed Market Study: Full Report and Analysis: https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/reports/workforce-analytics-market Artificial intelligence (AI) is playing an increasingly vital role in the workforce analytics market, enabling companies to unlock deeper insights and automate complex processes.
